Comment: Back in my day, conspiracies and kooks were more fun.  They were about Elvis still being alive, Paul McCartney being dead, and the chupacabra.  Now they're darker, angrier, and more paranoid than ever before and let me tell you, it's too depressing to listen to.
Author: Impossible-Fox4498
